title: Archive: Yugoslavia v Spain - Euro 2000
body_text:
Archive: Yugoslavia v Spain - Euro 2000
This content is not available in your location.
There was an error
Relive a classic encounter from Euro 2000 as Spain rescue their campaign with two goals in injury-time at the end of a thrilling match against Yugoslavia.
Watch Euros Rewind: Yugoslavia v Spain from Euro 2000 in full on BBC iPlayer.
Watch Uefa Euro 2020 next summer across the BBC.
